item.title: A New Engine… Again (And A Few Other Changes)
item.dc:creator: Chris Warrick
item.description:
Up­date 2013-02-07: Now run­ning Niko­la.

Hel­lo there. I have a few an­nounce­ments for you.

First of­f, I changed the blog en­gine. It is now ran by Hy­de, a port of Jekyll to Python (but im­proved).

Sec­ond of­f, all posts from 2009 were archived. If you are crazy and want to read them, see 2009 Ar­chives. They won’t be vis­i­ble on the Blog page.

Third of­f, the URLs of posts were changed a bit, but they are fixed by the serv­er.

Fourth of­f, the Projects page will get a lit­tle makeover soon.

That is al­l.

Read more… (0 paragraphs remaining — a 1 minutes’ read)
